actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to deny entitlement to hospital insurance benefits under part A of title XVIII of the Social Security Act in the case of certain disabled individuals currently entitled to health benefits under the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services (CHAMPUS).

summary.text: Denies concurrent entitlement to hospital insurance benefits provided by Medicare to disabled individuals eligible as of October 18, 1978, for custodial care under the CHAMPUS program.

titles.title: A bill to deny entitlement to hospital insurance benefits under part A of title XVIII of the Social Security Act in the case of certain disabled individuals currently entitled to health benefits under the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services (CHAMPUS).
